name: Buttons
description: Flexible button component with multiple variants and states.
codeWC:
<!-- Web Components (Primary) -->
<dotbox-button variant="primary">Primary</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="secondary">Secondary</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="danger">Danger</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="success">Success</dotbox-button>

<!-- With attributes -->
<dotbox-button variant="primary" size="large" icon="🚀">Launch</dotbox-button>
<dotbox-button variant="danger" disabled>Disabled</dotbox-button>

<!-- Event handling -->
<script>
document.querySelectorAll('dotbox-button').forEach(button => {
    button.addEventListener('dotbox-click', (e) => {
        console.log('Button clicked:', e.detail);
    });
});
</script>
codeJS:
<!-- JavaScript API (Alternative) -->
<script>
const button = new Dotbox.Button({
    text: 'Click Me',
    variant: 'primary',
    size: 'medium',
    onClick: () => console.log('Clicked!')
});
document.body.appendChild(button.getElement());
</script>

name: Text Boxes
description: Input fields with various states and validations.
codeWC:
<!-- Web Components (Primary) -->
<dotbox-textbox 
    label="Username" 
    placeholder="Enter your username"
    help-text="This will be your display name">
</dotbox-textbox>

<dotbox-textbox 
    label="Email" 
    type="email" 
    placeholder="user@example.com"
    help-text="We'll never share your email">
</dotbox-textbox>

<!-- Event handling -->
<script>
document.querySelector('dotbox-textbox').addEventListener('dotbox-input', (e) => {
    console.log('Input value:', e.detail.value);
});
</script>
codeJS:
<!-- JavaScript API (Alternative) -->
<script>
const textBox = new Dotbox.TextBox({
    label: 'Username',
    placeholder: 'Enter your username',
    helpText: 'This will be your display name',
    onChange: (e) => console.log('Text changed:', e.target.value)
});

document.body.appendChild(textBox.getContainer());
</script>

name: Dropdown
description: Select dropdown component with TextBox-like styling and multiple options.
codeWC:
<!-- Web Components (Primary) -->
<dotbox-dropdown 
    label="Country" 
    placeholder="Select your country"
    help-text="Choose your country of residence"
    options='[{"value":"us","label":"United States"},{"value":"ca","label":"Canada"},{"value":"uk","label":"United Kingdom"},{"value":"de","label":"Germany"},{"value":"fr","label":"France"}]'>
</dotbox-dropdown>

<dotbox-dropdown 
    label="Priority" 
    placeholder="Select priority level"
    size="small"
    options='[{"value":"low","label":"Low"},{"value":"medium","label":"Medium"},{"value":"high","label":"High"},{"value":"urgent","label":"Urgent"}]'
    value="medium">
</dotbox-dropdown>

<!-- With validation states -->
<dotbox-dropdown 
    label="Status" 
    placeholder="Select status"
    error
    help-text="Please select a valid status"
    options='[{"value":"active","label":"Active"},{"value":"inactive","label":"Inactive"},{"value":"pending","label":"Pending"}]'>
</dotbox-dropdown>

<!-- Event handling -->
<script>
document.querySelector('dotbox-dropdown').addEventListener('dotbox-change', (e) => {
    console.log('Selection changed:', e.detail.value, e.detail.selectedOption);
});
</script>
codeJS:
<!-- JavaScript API (Alternative) -->
<script>
const dropdown = new Dotbox.Dropdown({
    label: 'Country',
    placeholder: 'Select your country',
    options: [
        { value: 'us', label: 'United States' },
        { value: 'ca', label: 'Canada' },
        { value: 'uk', label: 'United Kingdom' },
        { value: 'de', label: 'Germany' },
        { value: 'fr', label: 'France' }
    ],
    helpText: 'Choose your country of residence',
    onChange: (e) => console.log('Selected:', e.target.value)
});

document.body.appendChild(dropdown.getContainer());
</script>

name: Code Block
description: Syntax-highlighted code display component with multiple language support.
codeWC:
<!-- Web Components (Primary) -->
<dotbox-code-block language="javascript">
function greet(name) {
    return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}

console.log(greet('World'));
</dotbox-code-block>

<!-- Multi-line code with HTML entities -->
<dotbox-code-block language="html">
<div class='container'>
    <h1>Welcome</h1>
    <p>Hello World!</p>
</div>
</dotbox-code-block>

<!-- CSS example -->
<dotbox-code-block language="css">
.btn {
    padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
    border-radius: 0.375rem;
    background: var(--color-primary);
    color: white;
}
</dotbox-code-block>
codeJS:
<!-- JavaScript API (Alternative) -->
<script>
const codeBlock = new Dotbox.CodeBlock({
    language: 'javascript',
    code: 'function greet(name) {\\n    return \`Hello, \${name}!\`;\\n}\\n\\nconsole.log(greet(\'World\'));'
});

document.body.appendChild(codeBlock.getElement());
</script>

name: Menu
description: Navigation menu component with selectable items.
codeWC:
<!-- Web Components (Primary) -->
<dotbox-menu 
    data-items='[{"id":"home","label":"Home"},{"id":"about","label":"About"},{"id":"services","label":"Services"},{"id":"contact","label":"Contact"}]'
    selected="home"
    bordered="true">
</dotbox-menu>

<!-- With routing mode (hash navigation) -->
<dotbox-menu 
    data-items='[{"id":"dashboard","label":"Dashboard"},{"id":"analytics","label":"Analytics"},{"id":"settings","label":"Settings"}]'
    selected="dashboard"
    routing-mode>
</dotbox-menu>

<!-- Event handling -->
<script>
document.querySelector('dotbox-menu').addEventListener('dotbox-select', (e) => {
    console.log('Selected menu item:', e.detail.selectedId);
});
</script>
codeJS:
<!-- JavaScript API (Alternative) -->
<script>
// Standard menu
const menu = new Dotbox.Menu({
    items: [
        { id: 'home', label: 'Home' },
        { id: 'about', label: 'About' },
        { id: 'services', label: 'Services' },
        { id: 'contact', label: 'Contact' }
    ],
    selected: 'home',
    onSelect: (id) => console.log('Selected:', id)
});

// Menu with routing mode (hash navigation)
const routingMenu = new Dotbox.Menu({
    items: [
        { id: 'dashboard', label: 'Dashboard' },
        { id: 'analytics', label: 'Analytics' },
        { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings' }
    ],
    routingMode: true, // Enable hash-based routing
    onSelect: (id) => console.log('Navigated to:', id)
});

document.body.appendChild(menu.getElement());
document.body.appendChild(routingMenu.getElement());
</script>
